comment: Professor Talley is a great professor! Class consists of 2 exams, 2 projects, and weekly pre-lab quizzes. The labs were easy to complete and understand. She responds to emails very quickly and gives multiple chances for extra credit. I would take her class again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Talley is great! She's incredibly personable and explains everything clearly. The structure of her class is easy to follow and an easy A. Pre-lab quizzes, two attempts each, easy 100. Two tests and two practicals, again, easy A. She explains how to make a poster pretty well, too. You can send her drafts early and she gives good feedback.
